description: The file serves as a server entry point for a Remix-based React application, handling HTTP requests, rendering server-side components, and managing streaming responses.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main export that handles incoming requests, determines if the request is from a bot or a browser, and delegates to the appropriate handler.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for bot requests, streaming the response using React's renderToPipeableStream.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for browser requests, streaming the response similarly to handleBotRequest.
